item.description:
We're cutting the price of our draft tournaments here at Untapped Games for the whole month of January! For just five dollars, you get three packs, play three rounds and keep what you draft. If you pay eight dollars, there is additional prize support:

3-0 record: 3 extra booster packs
2-0 with a tie: 2 extra packs
2-1 record: 1 extra pack

Our tournaments are held every Thursday at 7pm. All levels of experience are welcome! We are also holding FREE FNM booster box tournaments on January 18th and 25th in anticipation of our Gatecrash Prerelease.

Feel free to call 401-368-1619 if you have any questions or need help finding us!
item.name: $5 MTG Draft Tournaments Thursdays at Untapped Games
